DataElement.preferredName: Patient Other Healthcare Service Visit Specify Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The free-text field to describe the other healthcare service visit.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned._heading term for medical terms other than physician specialties; for organizations and facilities, see BIOMEDICAL RESOURCE._Work, or a product of that work, done by one person or group that benefits another._The act of going to see some person or place or thing; it can cover a short or long period but refers to a non-permanent arrangement.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredDefinition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.:heading term for medical terms other than physician specialties; for organizations and facilities, see BIOMEDICAL RESOURCE.:Work, or a product of that work, done by one person or group that benefits another.:The act of going to see some person or place or thing; it can cover a short or long period but refers to a non-permanent arrangement.

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.
heading term for medical terms other than physician specialties; for organizations and facilities, see BIOMEDICAL RESOURCE.
Work, or a product of that work, done by one person or group that benefits another.
The act of going to see some person or place or thing; it can cover a short or long period but refers to a non-permanent arrangement.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.
